Reviews.Title: “Good Quality - Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: TheKennedysClitheroe
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 3 nights recently impressed staff helpful hotel spotlessly clean liked modern minimalistic styling people centre hotel little reviews short journey town via taxi metro advice hotel bought t10 ticket trainmetro allowed 10 journeys fantastic value 10 euros note internet connection experienced free

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here”
Reviews.Author: AlexPBLondon
Reviews.Content: bit frustrating 3 night stay hotel woefully understaffed reception pointless dont clue wifi reception bit piece unsecured network according girl reception 2 iphones laptops blame smell stale smoke interlinked ventilation system nonsmoker strongly advise dont stay smell 60 night reception told impossible smell cigarettes terrible customer service whilst safe hotel doesnt feel secure person hotel midnight reception delivering service fire doors onto street remain permanently passer central london theyre trusting ill exclude bizarre amenities example theres throw rubbish leave cleaner leave dont bother tv mainly static furniture seen days investment standard obviously expectations regards price star rating stay cant imagine 4 star reviewed incomparable similar hotels weve stayed spain

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, outstanding staff”
Reviews.Author: SL-JR
Reviews.Content: impressed quality hotel rate paying staff reception friendly extremely helpful impressive floor ceiling picture window design tastefully modern array useful features ability control blinds bedside breakfast ok standard fare spectacular food delivered service excellent fresh tasty awful time arrive occasions location reasonably near metro looking eat walking distance caught restaurants dont 9am staff real highlight cant rate highly
